thread.section_title: sellbackyourBook.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of sellbackyourBook.com | sellbackyourbook.com
thread.title: Brenda

author: Brenda
title: Brenda
text: My household was overflowing with books I no longer needed. Wanting to give them away, I found Sell Back Your Books to be the option I needed. Loved the fact that I could just print the shipping labels, the search engine was comprehensive, the sell back values were as to be expected, the link to have the USPS pick up my box was easy, and the money was deposited into my account super fast. Already recommended to friends and would certainly use this company again myself.
